Subject: Re: Energon hunt
From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

He stood up against the strain, of the thirst of his engines. He drove a
powerful piston like fist into the crumbled ice, scattering the large
peaces of it, and kept trudging forward with his strenght, that could rend
other robots armor. He pushed on ignoring the continous depletion for
energon. He must find this source of energon, that was still burning, could
it be a generator? Did it once power a ship? But he was having problems
thinking due to his loss of energon. He probably wasnt able to transform.
